channel.title: How do I make my client playable for other players
channel.description: Ok so basically I have everything port fowarded. I have everything up and running. I uploaded the file to mediafire, and yes the client was zipped with Winrar. My friend tried downloading and when he opened client it bascically told him that it couldn't download the cache, retrying in - 10..9...8.. and so on. Why is this and how can I fix this?

item.title: How do I make my client playable for other players
item.dc:creator: @Xandra Xandra
item.description:
@Xandra wrote:

Can you give me a link?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make my client playable for other players

item.title: How do I make my client playable for other players
item.dc:creator: @Xandra Xandra
item.description:
@Xandra wrote:

Ok so basically I have everything port fowarded. I have everything up and running. I uploaded the file to mediafire, and yes the client was zipped with Winrar. My friend tried downloading and when he opened client it bascically told him that it couldn’t download the cache, retrying in - 10…9…8… and so on. Why is this and how can I fix this?
